p = 82820875767540480278499859101602250644399117699549694231796720388646919033627
encrypt(flag) = 26128737736971786465707543446495988011066430691718096828312365072463804029545
encrypt(msg) = 15673067813634207159976639166112349879086089811595176161282638541391245739514

s * msg = encrypt(msg) mod p

euclidian algorithm! (https://www.dcode.fr/modular-inverse#comments)

msg^-1 mod p: 548...
s = 54864004291246804401341290931185162835786921440081671370403905989696416063004 * encrypt(msg) % p = 47724061801079554597466585626373440191004658414760256322329566876897497386054

s^-1 mod p: 3282051094907229565273573872951361003221021290446275324072340426107730632901
flag = 3282051094907229565273573872951361003221021290446275324072340426107730632901 * encrypt(flag) % p

s * flag = encrypt(flag) mod p
